feed.title: Keila Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Keila: Keila v0.14.7
entry.content:
Version 0.14.7

Added

  • Image blocks now allow the use of Liquid in src and other attributes. Fixes #297 (thanks @dompie for reporting)

Fixed

  • Separators are now rendered more faithfully in the block editor

entry.title: New release for Keila: Keila v0.14.8
entry.content:
Version 0.14.8

Added

  • Campaigns with type block and json_body can now be created via the API. Implements #300 (thanks @dompie for suggesting)

entry.title: New release for Keila: Keila v0.14.9
entry.content:
Version 0.14.9

Fixed

  • Enabled translation of system strings on public forms.

entry.title: New release for Keila: Keila v0.14.10
entry.content:
Version 0.14.10

Changed

  • The analytics UI now shows a maximum of 20 links to avoid performance issues with large campaigns and individualized links

entry.title: New release for Keila: Keila v0.14.11
entry.content:
Version 0.14.11

Changed

  • Increased database timeout when inserting recipients to 60 seconds
